metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7489 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - high
metadata.Description:
FasterXML jackson-databind before 2.7.9.3, 2.8.x before 2.8.11.1 and 2.9.xbefore 2.9.5 allows unauthenticated remote code execution because of anincomplete fix for the CVE-2017-7525 deserialization flaw. This isexploitable by sending maliciously crafted JSON input to the readValuemethod of the ObjectMapper, bypassing a blacklist that is ineffective ifthe c3p0 libraries are available in the classpath.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7489` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjackson2-databind-java - 2.9.5-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.9.5-1').
